description: Identifies whether the measurement occurs pre-treatment ("Pre") or post-treatment ("Post").

Average stand basal area, including trees DBH >= 15cm. For pre-treatment measurements, this value is taken from a single point in time. For post-treatment, this is a weighted average, in which the mean value during each measurement interval is weighted by the number of years in the measurement interval.
Standard error of the value in the "PrePost" column.
Lower bound of 95% confidence interval of the value in the "PrePost" column.
Upper bound of 95% confidence interval of the value in the "PrePost" column.
Average percent difference between the pre-treatment and post-treatment estimates.
Standard error of average percent difference between pre- and post-treatment measurements.
Name of treatment; Burn = prescribed burn; Thin = mechanical thining; Burn+Thin = both prescribed burn and mechancial thin; Control = control.
